replies.text: You can let me know if you want to add or complete a task.
replies.speak: You can let me know if you want to add or complete a task.

replies.text: Do you want to hear more from your list?
replies.speak: Do you want to hear more from your list?

replies.text: It seems you have no tasks in your {listType} list. Just let me know if you want to create a new task.
replies.speak: It seems you have no tasks in your {listType} list. Just let me know if you want to create a new task.

replies.text: Alright. If you want to set up a new to do, just ask me to create a new task. You can also ask me to complete or delete a task on your list.
replies.speak: Alright. If you want to set up a new to do, just ask me to create a new task. You can also ask me to complete or delete a task on your list.

replies.text: You have {taskCount} tasks on your {listType} list today.
replies.speak: You have {taskCount} tasks on your {listType} list today.
